Resolution:
Choose the desired resolution for Tears of The Kingdom.
NOTE: This is an internal upscaler, using Dynamic FPS.
Extended Memory layout in Yuzu is Mandatory.
FPS: Choose the desired FPS LIMIT for Tears of The Kingdom.
Shadows:
Choose the desired SHADOW resolution for Tears of The Kingdom.
Note: Recommended to use 1024x.
Camera Quality:
Increases camera Picture Quality.
Note: Recommended to not use this mod, as it COULD cause issues.
UI:
Choose the button prompts for Tears of The Kingdom.
Note: Recommended to use BlackscreenFIX, if you don't desire to use any other UI mod.
First Person: Switches all cameras to First Person.
DFPS:
Select DFPS Version.
It's recommended to use the latest available.
Note: Versions below 1.5.4 are not fully supported.
Aspect Ratio:
Aspect Ratio mods, those mods are a combination of various UI changes.
Note: Full support up to 1.2.0 and partial support after 1.2.1.
Presets: Preset Mods for Tears of The Kingdom.
Settings: Select Yuzu PRESET settings, based on your PC configuration.
Reset: Removes the portable path and defaults to Appdata
Backup: Backups your Tears of The Kingdom saves.
Kofi:
If you want to support this project.
feel free to check out my Kofi page.
Switch: Switches between Yuzu and Ryujinx Manager.
Main: The Main section of the Mod Manager.
Cheats: In this tab you can add cheats to your game.
Shaders:
Clear Shader Cache, YUZU only. 
Sometimes can Improve performance and Fix Visual bugs.
Remove QuaReduction:
Improves Quality when FPS drops.
This is mandatory with new DFPS.
Remove Lensflare:
Removes lensflare effect,
Note: The lensflare in TOTK flickers a lot..
Improve LOD:
Improves the distant objects in the game.
This has no effect on performance.
Remove FXAA:
Removes Internal FX Anti Aliasing, 
NOTE: could improve quality with external upscaler.
Remove FSR:
Removes Internal FSR 1.0 Upscaler, 
NOTE: could reduce blurriness and improve quality.
fonts:
Change fonts from the ones present
Note: Some of the fonts may need to be installed separately.
Windows Scaling:
Select GUI scaling.
On: Scales based on Windows scaling.
1-2x Manual scaling, Be careful.
Auto Backup: Backup save files, every time you click apply.
Auto Backup Cheats: Backup save files, every time you click apply In the cheat Menu.
Gui Animations:
Removes GUI animation, specifically for cheat Menu.
Note: There shouldn't be need to turn this off.
Mark all Korok:
Marks all the korok seeds on the map 
Note: Zoom in!.
Infinite Durability: Infinite Durability for Weapons and Shields.
Infinite Items (500):
Makes all items Infinite,
Note: recommended to do a backup.
Infinite Zonai Devices: Lets you summon Zonai devices infinitely.
Mark ALl Shrines: Marks all the shrines on the map.
No skill CD: Removes the skill CD of sages.
